key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and potential fines from Ofwat and the Environment Agency
Uncertainty around the Price Review 2024 (PR24) and its impact on future revenue streams

Aging infrastructure requiring significant capital investment
Climate change risks impacting infrastructure resilience
controversies: Failure to meet leakage reduction targets
Wastewater spills leading to environmental damage and fines
Negative media coverage and public trust issues due to service disruptions
environmental_issues: Climate change challenges to infrastructure resilience
Need for substantial investment to meet net-zero carbon emissions targets
social_issues: Affordability concerns due to rising water bills
Need for customer support programs to address water poverty
Public perception and trust issues due to service disruptions
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance and performance against Ofwat targets
Management of capital expenditure and financial resilience
Alignment with ESG trends and sustainability commitments
